UPGRADE YOURSELF

Optimal and Efficient Learning Methods

Effective learning is an approach or learning method that helps someone obtain optimal knowledge, skills or understanding in a relatively short time and with efficient effort.

THE IMPORTANCE
OF
EFFECTIVE LEARNING

Knowing yourself is an important process in personal development that helps us understand who we really are, what we want, and how we can reach our maximum potential. Know yourself.What do you want.then improve your learning process

Keep Studying
Dont Give Up

Face it All
UPGRADE YOURSELF

METHOD

SEE ALL

"Make a regular schedule."

Have a regular study schedule and stick to it. This helps you divide your time well between studying and other activities.

“Focus on difficult material.”

Prioritize studying difficult material first. This allows you to focus more of your energy and time on material that requires more attention.

“Creating a comfortable learning atmosphere”

Make sure your study place is comfortable and free from distractions. Apart from that, make sure you have enough study equipment such as books, notes and writing utensils.

"Know yourself"

Knowing ourselves is the process of understanding who we are in depth, including understanding our values, beliefs, strengths, weaknesses, interests, emotions and motivations. It involves introspection or self-reflection to gain insight into the way we think, feel, and behave in various situations.

"Use effective study methods."

Everyone has a different way of learning. Find a study method that is effective for you, or discuss it with classmates.

"Do the practice over and over again"

There is always an Exercise at the end of each lesson chapter. Do this exercise to evaluate your understanding of the material studied.

"Ask your closest friends or family"

Don't be afraid to ask friends or family if you have difficulty understanding the material you are studying.

"Get enough rest"

Make sure you get enough rest and don't forget to take breaks. Your body and brain need time to rest so that they can work optimally while studying.

"Periodic self-evaluation"

Carry out regular self-evaluations to find out your weaknesses and strengths in studying. This allows you to improve your way of learning.

Learn more about
yourself and
how you will learn

UPGRADE YOURSELF

Nah gimana sih sebenernya cara untuk mengenal kemampuan diri? Di video ini, Satu Persen membahas pentingnya mengenal kemampuan diri untuk menghadapi rasa insecure.
